extracted_playbook.title: Identify Indicators of Compromise
extracted_playbook.description: Check for any activity related to ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus indicators of compromise within the network.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are there any indicators of compromise?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to ADSelfService Plus Build 6114
extracted_playbook.description: Update to Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus build 6114 to fix CVE-2021-40539.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Internet Access
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure ADSelfService Plus is not directly accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Domain-wide Password Resets
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct domain-wide password resets to mitigate unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Double Kerberos TGT Password Resets
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct double Kerberos Ticket Granting Ticket (TGT) password resets if NTDS.dit file was compromised.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Incident to CISA or FBI
extracted_playbook.description: Report the incident to CISA or the FBI if any indicators of compromise are found, including unauthorized access or lateral movement.
